name: Neon Horizon: Eclipse
description:
Neon Horizon: Eclipse is a first-person action platformer in which you have to go on an exciting adventure across eight different islands. Each island has its own unique traps and obstacles.

Resist hordes of mutants, solve puzzles, go through mazes and overcome traps. Get glory points for destroying enemies and passing obstacles, collect as many as possible to take a leading position. Loot chests, spin the wheel of fortune to get extra fame points, ammunition and special abilities.

- 8 types of mutants.
- Atmospheric background music.
- Beautiful stylized environment.
- Each level has unique traps and obstacles.
